content: questionable content gordon crochet by katie schmirler character design by jeph jacques materials worsted weight yarn in purple for head and body and blue and pink for details or any colour and make your own arachnopc 4 25 mm g/6 crochet hook stitch marker/scrap yarn to mark start of round polyfill tapestry needle safety eyes one pair 24 mm and one pair 6 mm abbreviations magic_ring magic_ring single_crochet single_crochet increase increase 2 single_crochet in one single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 2 together inv decrease invisible decrease single_crochet 2 decrease in front loops only chain chain head in purple 1 magic_ring single_crochet 6 6 2 increase around 12 3 *single_crochet 1 increase* around 18 4 *single_crochet 1 increase single_crochet 1* around 24 5 *single_crochet 3 increase* around 30 6 *single_crochet 2 increase single_crochet 2* around 36 7 *single_crochet 4 increase single_crochet 4* around 40 8 *single_crochet 9 increase* around 44 9 single_crochet 14 increase single_crochet 13 increase single_crochet 14 increase 47 10 single_crochet around 47 11 single_crochet around 47 12 single_crochet around 47 13 single_crochet 14 inv decrease single_crochet 13 inv decrease single_crochet 14 inv decrease 44 14 *single_crochet 9 inv decrease* around 40 15 *single_crochet 4 inv decrease single_crochet 4* around 36 16 *single_crochet 2 inv decrease single_crochet 2* around 30 place eyes i put the 24 mm eye between row 9 and 10 with 2 stitches visible between them and the 6 mm eyes between row 8 and 9 a stitch over from the edge of the large eye 17 *single_crochet 3 inv decrease* around 24 18 *single_crochet 1 inv decrease single_crochet 1* around 18 stuff 19 *single_crochet 1 inv decrease* around 12 20 inv decrease around 6 finish off head fangs in blue make 2 1 magic_ring single_crochet 6 6 2 increase single_crochet to end 7 3 increase single_crochet to end 8 4 increase single_crochet to end 9 5 single_crochet 4 incomplete round this makes one half slightly longer to fit better around the curve of the face fasten_off and sew to head a row or two below the eyes pedipalps in pink make 2 1 magic_ring single_crochet 6 6 2 increase around 12 3 single_crochet around 12 4 single_crochet around 12 5 single_crochet around 12 6 *single_crochet 3 inv decrease* around 8 stuff draw opening closed to attach to head use blue yarn to create two 5 single_crochet foundation chains sew to pedipalps and head at desired angles on either side of fangs with one stitch in between legs make 8 of each segment 1 in blue 1 magic_ring single_crochet 7 7 2 - 7 single_crochet around 7 leave tail for sewing segment 2 in pink 1 magic_ring single_crochet 4 4 2 single_crochet around 4 3 increase single_crochet around 5 4 increase single_crochet around 6 5 - 7 single_crochet around 6 leave tail for sewing stuff with magic_ring tail use fasten_off tail to sew to the magic_ring of segment 1 the spiral of the crochet might create a bit of an angle to the magic_ring of segment 1
